items.content_html: SysMonitoring is a lightweight open-source and easy-to-use npm module for real-time system monitoring. It provides detailed insights into system performance, such as CPU, RAM, and program latency, in an intuitive and modern dashboard interface.
items.title: sheitabrk/sysmonitoring: SysMonitoring is a lightweight open-source and easy-to-use npm module for real-time system monitoring. It provides detailed insights into system performance, such as CPU, RAM, and program latency, in an intuitive and modern dashboard interface.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: Notably is a lightweight, personalized note-taking web-app designed for efficient task and life management. It serves as a to-do list while offering widgets that provide key updates on inevitable aspects of daily life. With a focus on simplicity and usability, it helps users stay organized and informed in a seamless, intuitive way.
items.title: Nemoxus/Notably: Notably is a lightweight, personalized note-taking web-app designed for efficient task and life management. It serves as a to-do list while offering widgets that provide key updates on inevitable aspects of daily life. With a focus on simplicity and usability, it helps users stay organized and informed in a seamless, intuitive way.

items.content_html: Project dedicated to fight Layer 7 DDoS with proof of work, with an additional WAF and controller. Completed with full set of features and containerized for rapid and lightweight deployment.

items.content_html: Jsert is a lightweight JavaScript for writing unit tests for web applications. It offers a lot of flexibility in terms of how developers right unit tests with little to no restrictions.
